description: Transferring files with well-known filenames (sensitive files with credential data) using network shares Author: @neu5ron, Teymur Kheirkhabarov, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Transferring sensitive files for legitimate administration work by legitimate administrator
name: Transferring Files with Credential Data via Network Shares - Zeek
query: (event.dataset:"smb_files" AND file.name.text:("\\mimidrv" OR "\\lsass" OR "\\windows\\minidump\\" OR "\\hiberfil" OR "\\sqldmpr" OR "\\sam" OR "\\ntds.dit" OR "\\security"))
